articles.author: Paul Wiseman
articles.title: What to know about the Trump tariffs upending global trade and markets - AP News
articles.description: The trade war President Donald Trump promised has begun, threatening the world economy and straining the United States’ longstanding alliances in Europe and Asia. Goods imported from dozens of countries and territories are now going to be taxed at sharply hig…
